Name: Victoria's Secret
Ingredients: 15 ml Bottlegreen Cox's Apple and Plum Cordial
45 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
Instructions: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. SHAKE other ingredients with ice and carefully strain into glass so this second layer floats on first.
Review: Amber and red layer easily in this fruity drink.
History: Created in 2008 by Jamie Stephenson at The Bar Academy, Manchester, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Victoria's Secret contains 247 calories
